title: The.Tom.and.Jerry.Show.S01E14.REAL.720p.WEB-DL.AAC2.0.H.264-YFN
description:
The Tom and Jerry Show - Season 1 - Episode 14 (WEB-DL - 720p) [REAL]
--------------------------------------------------------------

The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back in The Tom and Jerry Show, a fresh
take on the classic series. Preserving the look, characters and sensibility
of the original, the all-new series shines a brightly colored, high-definition
lens on the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry
two of the most beloved characters of all time. Comprised of two 11-minute shorts,
each episode will feature Tom the cat and Jerry the mouse plotting against each
other in their traditional suburban setting, as well as additional storylines
where their rivalry is set in more fantastic worlds, like a medieval castle
or even a mad scientist's lab. With a setup as elementary as a cat chasing
a mouse and the mouse's retaliations, the possibilities are endless!

Produced by Renegade Animation and Warner Bros. Animation.


"Turn About": Butch locks Tom in the basement to keep him from
a date with Toodles. Tom tries to escape, but keeps getting
blocked by Jerry and Tuffy who think it's a monster downstairs.

"The Plight Before Christmas": Tom accidentally puts a spell on
Santa and, as a result of Santa's new state, Tom and Jerry
volunteer to help Santa deliver gifts. A Christmas miracle occurs.

The.Tom.and.Jerry.Show.S01E14.Turn.About.-.The.Plight.Before.Christmas.720p.WEB-DL.AAC2.0.H.264-YFN

Format: Matroska Video File (MKV)
Video: MPEG4 Video (H264) 1280x718 23.976fps
Audio: MPEG4 Audio (AAC) 48000Hz stereo
Subs: English Closed Captions (SubRip Text)
Duration: 00:21:51
File size: 548 MB


* REAL = This episode was originally skipped on iTunes and Amazon
but today they fixed. Because of that, the numbering of the WEB-DL
releases become a little off. The correct episode order is:
